itunes:title: Episode 730 - Special Guest Dave Rubin Of The Blaze
title: Episode 730 - Special Guest Dave Rubin Of The Blaze
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Blaze’s Dave Rubin to discuss the “war on reality” that the media profits from and makes worse, why the left attacks America’s foundational ideals and institutions, if radicals are evil or just misguided,...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Blaze’s Dave Rubin to discuss the “war on reality” that the media profits from and makes worse, why the left attacks America’s foundational ideals and institutions, if radicals are evil or just misguided, the GOP’s total lack of options after Trump, COVID vaccines, and why Dave admires Jordan Peterson.
